Do you love mountains? Do you want to see stunning images of majestic peaks, serene valleys, and breathtaking landscapes every time you open a new tab in your browser? If yes, then you should try the Mountain Wallpapers chrome extension!

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Mountain Wallpaper extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://medianet.xyz/terms.html and Policy https://medianet.xyz/privacy.html.
